name: Android and Google Play Icon Template
description:
Use this file to design launcher icons for Android 8 Oreo and above, based on the official guide on adaptive icons from Google. This freebie includes the keyline grid and a swappable preview frame for different icon masks.


Do you find this useful? Support my work ➔


What's new

  • Added tooltips for clearer guidance.
  • Added icon frame to keyline shapes.

Previous updates

  • Added color and effect styles for easier reuse
  • Adjusted finish and surface lighting to accurately follow the prescribed specs
  • Added a separate component for the keyline shapes and moved it out of the foreground layer for easier access
  • Added export presets for Google Play and APK launcher icons
